role.argrole: level arg0 works his way up to

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 许多)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VP (VV 孜孜兀兀)) (PU ，) (VP (DVP (VP (ADVP (AD 好)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VA 容易)))) (VP (VV 干到) (NP-OBJ (NN 主管)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 欧吉桑们))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 往往)) (VP (VPT (VV 看) (AD 不) (VA 惯)) (NP-OBJ (DNP (QP (ADJP (JJ 年轻)) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 代)))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 率性) (CC 与) (NN 散漫))))))
